General.Name: Bright Led Electronics Corp
General.Description: Bright LED Electronics Corp. manufactures and sells light-emitting diode, indicator lights, displays, and other products in China, Taiwan, Korea, the United States, and internationally. The company offers PCBA products, such as motor, sensor, and LED light bar assemblies; LED components comprising lamps, displays, SMDs, PLCC, and infrared; and LED indoor, outdoor, and specialty lighting products. It also engages in the producing and processing of LED die and artificial crystals; import and export business; and PCB processing activities. The company offers its products for applications in 3C industry, lighting market, automotive market, and other markets. Bright LED Electronics Corp. was founded in 1981 and is based in New Taipei City, Taiwan.
General.Address: No.19, Heping Road, New Taipei City, Taiwan, 22061
